Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for you, just like it does for me. This extraordinary item is priced at $950000, reflecting its exceptional quality and unique features. I trust this offer will be attractive enough for you to consider it seriously. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
